choices: Main characters? We don't need no main characters!
1.content:
My goodness. It would seem that because I'm similar to nearly every other person that starts these horrible interactives, there's nothing for you to start from, aside from a simple list, followed by even more lists. Perhaps you should have seen this coming, perhaps you're just stupid. Regardless, I'm sure you can just sit back and let a more talented individual handle the first few chapters like you always do, you lazy ass.

Who shall the main character of this shameless expansion extravaganza be?
1.title: Oh gog how will we be starting this off

11.content: You know 'em, you love 'em, now you can do whatever your twisted mind desires to them.
11.title: One of the kids

111.content: An innocent enough kid. Let's make him a little bigger.
111.title: John

1113.content: Perhaps he's turned into an unassuming predator. Or he wants to stomp around a bit.
1113.title: More

112.content: Rose is an expert on horribly written fanfiction, but even she'd probably be appalled by this. So we better make it worth her distaste....choose what you want done with our seer of light / witch of grimdark.
112.title: Rose Lalonde

choices: In the Land of Light and Rain, pre-scratch
1121.content: Obviously, everything here is way off canon, so just choose a time/place that you like.
1121.title: Rose: Breast expansion

choices: She uses black magic to indulge in a secret fantasy
Someone else does it to her to try to stop her mad plans
11211.content: What's the reason behind Rose's soon to be heaving bosoms?
11211.title: The Land of Boobs and.....boobs.

112111.content:
"You sure?" Dave asked, looking off into the distance, away from her. The light of the rainbow ocean reflected off his sunglasses. Behind him, Rose gave a smile just shy of smug. Her needles dangled loosely in her hands, pulsing with the dark energy she had grown so familiar with.

"It's within your abilities, isn't it? Or have I overestimated the powers of a coolkid. Perhaps I overestimated your coolness itself, bedazzled by nought but a mere facade."

Dave didn't answer that. Rose knew she couldn't get a rise out of him, not like that. It was one of the reasons she loved him so dearly.

"I don't go messing in your grimdark bookishness, do I?" he retorted after a moment. "The thing is, I don't remember an extra Rose running around. That much snark would produce a snark black hole. Freaking sarcasm particles flying everywhere and all that pseudoscience shit."

"A snark singularity? Would it be orbited by contemptuous comets? Is passive-aggressive simply the superposition of the two states?"

"What kind of land always rains anyway?" Dave asked, kicking at the white sand. "Needs more gears and lava. That's badass. This is, like, sissy land."

"The fact of the matter is that I either covered my tracks well enough to maintain causality, or I create a divergent timeline. In which case we've already effectively diverted, since you are going to take me back. So there's no need to worry."

Dave appeared to be looking down, but it was hard to tell - just the slightest cock of his head. "Yeah, okay." he said. A pair of turntables appeared in midair, and he laid his hands over them. Rose stepped in close, and gave another close-lipped smile. Dave stayed silent, still, and from this angle Rose could see his eyes were on the horizon, as if he was elsewhere even now.

In a flash, they were back in time. To near the very beginning of the game - they weren't sure how the timestream of skaia related to that of Earth's, but Dave wasn't willing to bring her back before hand, muttering something about "keeping it sane".

"Thank you Dave." Rose said, reaching up and laying a hand on his shoulder. He turned to her, and for once, lowered his glasses. Looking him straight in the eyes was so strange, so unexpected, that even Rose had to pause, her mind going still.

"Stay out of trouble." he said. He was gone in a flash. Rose hadn't even seen him move, let alone the turntables. She smiled. He was sweet - but it was better that he wasn't around for this. Rose knew, one way or another, that her time could well come to a close soon. This could be an alternate timeline, but even if it wasn't, she could die trying to cause the scratch, or succeed only to not avoid the "reset" it would provide....so Rose wanted a day to herself. A last day, like a death row inmate getting a last meal, where she could finally get what she had always wanted. She was by the turtles' library, hours ahead of her past self. There was a lot there on dark magic, and Rose could now study a very interesting book she had spotted but not, until now, had time for. A very interesting book about manipulating the body....
112111.title: The dark...uh, even darker side to Rose.

1122.content:
Weight gain? WOAH!

Well, with that cleared up, when does this whole wacky spectacle happen?
1122.title: Weight Gain

114.title: Jade

1141.content: A popular choice. The next question is, when do you want this to take place?
1141.title: Jade: Weight gain

choices: Kids & Trolls have met up in the meteor lab
11412.content: Since HS is still a work in progress, speculatory scenarios, things you'd like to see happen, etc, all go here. Hey, this is your fantasy, right? So, pick the scenario.
11412.title: Jade: WG: Alt worlds

choices: Romantic expert Nepeta, on her way to lunch
114121.content:
Jade's eyes glanced about constantly as she walked down the stairs of the lab. There was something about this place that seemed so appropriately alien, and the empty, vast hallways unnerved her. Somehow, her own steps seemed to echo against the blackness even though she could never hear anyone else coming. While for the most part she was growing used to their new teammates, it was still startling to round a corner and see a yellow-eyed being with razor-sharp teeth come out of nowhere. Some of the trolls scared her more than others....that 'Equius' fellow gave Jade such creeps she could barely stay in the same room as him, while on the other hand Karkat was just...well, adorable...

Jade blushed, feeling embarrassed despite being alone. For the first time, excepting some memo shenanigans, Jade got to see how Karkat interacted with everyone else. It had shown her an entire different side of him. His voice was raspy from yelling because he was keeping everyone in line. He was constantly angry because he was so incredibly dedicated to getting everything right. He was a leader. And surprisingly, when things got serious, he didn't get louder, he just got somehow more intense. It was a sight to see.

Another sight to see was the way Karkat calmed down. It was only around Kanaya. Jade had had troll romance explained to her, and didn't really understand it. She got the concept of a morail...kinda...but it seemed to imply that Karkat needed her in a way he didn't need anyone else. Jade wasn't fully ready to admit her feelings for Karkat, but *if* she liked him...would she even be enough for him?

Jade just couldn't understand. That was one of the reasons she was wandering the halls - to try and clear her head from the commotion of the main lab area, where Karkat tried to keep order. Dave had had the right idea - almost as soon as they had made it here, he had disappeared off. Oddly, so had that red-eyed troll....Terezi....she creeped Jade out. Hopefully Dave was okay! Jade almost laughed at herself. Of course Dave was okay! He was Dave! He was waaaaay too cool to get into trouble.

Still, Jade needed someone to talk to. She didn't feel she could go to Rose, who had never quite been the same after that..grimdark incident. Jade rounded a corner, looked up, and realized that if any, this may be her chance to understand this, as she saw...
114121.title: Jade's confusion

choices: Jade has a reaction to the food
They continue to eat and start to talk about romance
1141211.content:
Nepeta was crouched down on the floor, butt in the air, pawing at something out of sight from Jade's angle. Jade wasn't sure whether to giggle or roll her eyes. It seemed like Nepeta might legitimately think she was part cat or something, but she otherwise seemed perfectly with it. Peppy, and playful, Jade regretted dismissing Nepeta all those years, when she could have been talking to someone with such similar fursuits PURSUITS pursuits, yes, like....Jade was sure they would have had a lot in common. She took a step to approach Nepeta and the girl immediately turned around, big yellow eyes spotting Jade, something fluffy dangling from her cleft lip. Nepeta immediately spat it into her hand and hid it in one of the pockets of her massive green coat as she stood up.

"Oh, heh heh....hello Jade! What a pawseant surprise! I was just...."

"Hey Nepeta!" Jade waved back, smiling weakly. She found Nepeta tended to be a little more awkward in real life....she heard that the troll girl had grown up pretty much in the wild, so that made sense. That was really something Jade could relate to, though it meant that neither of them really knew how to steer the conversation.

"I was...uh, on my way to lunch, and..."

"Oh?" Jade interrupted. "Would....you mind if I joined?" With all that happened in such a short time frame, Jade was pretty sure she hadn't eaten since well before even getting the game. Nepeta was surprised by her request, then quickly looked ecstatic, her typical :3 smile forming.

"That would be purrrfect! Sure, follow me!" Nepeta gestured her on. Jade gave a buck-tooth grin and gladly followed beside Nepeta. The troll girl practically skipped as she walked, and after a few steps even began to hum. She glanced over though, and as soon as she realized Jade had noticed, stopped and blushed the strangest shade of green.

"Uh, boy Nepeta, you sure are nicer than most of the others." Jade said, not sure if it was more awkward to talk or stay silent. Nepeta kept blushing.

"They're not really that meown...you just have to get to know them!"

"Well, I guess, but, like, doesn't Equius seem a little purrverse?" Jade replied, not even noticing her pun. Nepeta picked up on it though. She laughed nervously.

"That's just Equimouse.....oops! Don't let him know i called him that!"

"Haha, it's okay." Jade replied with a smile. Nepeta grinned back. They were shortly at a door, marked with the same sign that adorned Nepeta's shirt. In red...Jade was willing to ignore that, until she saw the other side of the room. Paintings, but mostly what looked like a graph or chart, all done in black and a blood red. Jade tried to keep smiling.

"I'm glad Sollux found the captcha codes to food!" Nepeta giggled, heading over to what looked remarkably like a fridge. She pulled out a couple plates of...something purple and oozing, along with little blue lumps....Jade must have shown her distaste by accident, as Nepeta easily noticed.

"Just try a little...pweeeeeease..." Nepeta's eyes went so large they barely fit on her head, and her little cleft lip quivered. It was like looking at a kitten, and Jade couldn't say no to such a face. She picked up one of the lumps and reluctantly popped it in her mouth.

"Not...nng...bad..." she said, finding it as chewy as taffy, but salty and slightly like mushrooms. Nepeta lit up, and joyfully guided Jade over to a small desk to use as a table.
1141211.title: A Romance expert?

choices: The two continue talking, oblivious to the changes
11412111.content:
"I never would have guessed I'd end up here..." Jade said, popping another blue lumpy thing in her mouth. She wondered about utensils, but remembering Nepeta's upbringing decided not to ask. Nepeta giggled.

"Yeah, I know! I'm kinda glad it ended up like this."

"Really? Don't you miss anything from your home?" Jade asked. Nepeta's face drooped.

"I miss Ponce- I miss my lusus." Nepeta said. Jade's heart went out to her. After having 'lusus' explained to her a while back, she immediately identified, as that was exactly what Bec had been for her. Sure, in a way, her grandfather had always been there, but still...just as Jade was about to say something, however, Nepeta perked up.

"Still! I've had so much fun! And we almost won! Plus, I...got to make new friends." she looked away from Jade, but was smiling. Jade gave her big buck-tooth grin back.

"Aww, thanks, Nepeta, I - oof..." Jade interrupted herself as she felt her stomach twinge. She reached down and gave it a rub. It felt a little odd, but Jade just assumed it was from going so long without food. She hadn't noticed that it was a bit thicker than it had been. Nepeta gave Jade a questioning look.

"Sorry." Jade said, continuing her meal. "I guess I do feel lucky. I mean, I'm sorry all those people died...but it couldn't have been helped, right? I don't know, I don't understand that time stuff."

"Haha, me neither!" Nepeta replied, "Purrsonally, I think all that time stuff is silly!"

"Heh, yeah....what was your title then?" Jade asked, shifting to try to ease the discomfort she felt. Under the table, her belly was beginning to press against the belt of her skirt. Her otherwise loose clothing was hiding the way her legs were also starting to puff up, but she was also beginning to feel a tightness in her chest, particularly at her bra-strap.

"I am the Rogue of Heart." Nepeta said proudly. Jade blinked, processed this, and then-

"That's adorable!" she said excitedly, clapping her hands. The noise hid the sound of her belt coming undone. Under her shirt, a now doughy belly was beginning to press outwards. Anyone less oblivious than Jade probably would have noticed, but her attention was elsewhere. Nepeta's cheeks went completely green at Jade's remark. It got Jade worry.

"Did I, did I say something wrong? I'm sorry, I don't know troll culture, I didn't mean-"

"No, no.." Nepeta said, shifting awkwardly. She looked pleased though. "...no one's called me apawrable before."

"Really?" Jade asked, now beginning to plump up all around. "That's silly." she popped another piece of food in her mouth.
11412111.title: Strange food, strange reaction

114121112.content:
"Y'know, I think...oof..." Jade huffed, feeling even more uncomfortable. She rubbed her belly, and felt something odd. First, she reached her belly far earlier than she expected to. Second, when she did, it gave way underneath her hand! Jade looked down, and it took a moment for her to register the sight in front of her. A squishy paunch was jutting out from her, forming a tent in her shirt and encroaching on her lap. It clicked in her brain that this was her fat, squishy belly, and she jumped up with a shriek. Before Nepeta could react, Jade was grabbing her doughy excess with both hands.

"How did this happen?" she asked. "What..what....the food!" Jade looked wide-eyed at the half-eaten plate in front of her. Nepeta got up, her face making an 'o' of shock.

"You....oh my! Jade, I'm so sorry! I didn't know humans would....I....I'm sorry!"

"Oh my god, oh my god..." Jade said, not even paying Nepeta any attention. Forgetting herself, she began to basically feel herself up, testing in horror at the layers of padding on her. She looked easily forty pounds heavier, overall. The thirteen year old was already a bit well developed, but now overweight her boobs had gotten larger than many a full grown woman's, her hips were softer, her arms thicker and even her cheeks a bit rounder, increasing her already rodent-like look. The only thing holding up her skirt, she realized, was her fat backside.

"Ahh! I can't believe this..." Jade said. Nepeta approached her, looking like she wanted to help Jade somehow but couldn't decide what to do, her hands hanging in midair.

"I'm so sorrrry! I didn't know - please don't be mad at me!"

Jade was panting, but beginning to come back to reality. She shook her head. "I'm, I'm not mad at you. Oh, I'm so stupid! I just started eating alien food, from another universe! What was I thinking!"

"It's not so bad..." Nepeta tried to comfort Jade. She had a pile of furs clearly designed as a bed, and tugged on Jade's arm in that direction. Jade acquiesced, feeling it'd be safer for her to sit down, with her skirt barely held up. She winced as she felt seams tighten here and there, threatening to snap. Jade whimpered, unsure what to do. Nepeta sat next to her, looking just as distraught.

"Oh my god....I gotta warn the others....no, no I can't let them see me..." Jade said, conflicted.

"It's...it's not that bad." Nepeta said. She prodded Jade's belly with a paw/hand, watching the way it wobbled. "You're...just a little softer! It's really kinda neat! That's pawll! No one will mind, not when you explain." she prodded Jade again, and this time murred slightly to herself. Jade paused her fretting, and..
114121112.title: Jade Flips the f- well, you know

1141211122.content:
"N-nepeta....please, that tickles." Jade said, blushing a little. Nepeta paused and stopped pushing around Jade's new belly. She sat up straight and turned green.

"Sorry..."

"I guess it's not too bad..." Jade said with a huff, grabbing her new flab. "We can fix this. Maybe it's just temporary?"

"Y-yeah. I meown, it could have been a lot worse. I'm sorry Jade..."

"It's not your fault." Jade said, laying a hand on Nepeta's shoulder. "And it doesn't feel bad or anything, I don't think I'm gonna die."

"Right. Look on the bright side! You'll get the best belly rubs now!" Nepeta said, :3 smiling.

"A-heh...right..." Jade said. "Uh, Nepeta...this is kinda weird, but do you really think, like...that you're a kitty?"

"Oh! No, of course....not really, I mean, kinda, yes?" Nepeta replied. She put on her grumpy face. "Ponce de Leon raised me! Everyone takes after their lusus...most trolls just aren't that close."

"I..guess that makes sense." Jade said, looking away awkwardly.

"Why did you ask?"

"It's just..." Jade paused, started, and paused again. "You won't tell anyone, right?"

"I'd never let the cat out of the bag!" Nepeta said, leaning in, big eyes starting at Jade. "What is it?"

"I...know exactly what you mean." Jade admitted, cheeks going pink. "Bec raised me! He was always there. In a way....I kinda felt like his pup. Oh maaan, that must sound so stupid."

"Murr, no it doesn't! That makes purrfect sense!"

"R-really?" Jade asked. "I don't know...I wondered some times though. Like what it'd be like...with those ears, or that coat, or...just to have my belly rubbed."

"If you want," Nepeta replied, her voice going quieter, "I could show you."

Jade blushed even harder, but nodded. Nepeta tugged on her shoulders, and guided her down so that Jade's midsection lay over Nepeta's lap. She was tense at first, especially scared her new weight would hurt the small-seeming troll girl, but Nepeta said nothing. She reached out and pressed her fingertips against Jade's belly. She kneaded the excess flesh back and forth in a rhythmic motion, using enough pressure to move Jade's belly but not enough to force it where it shouldn't go. Jade relaxed with a sigh, and after a little more work let out a little coo at the way Nepeta was working over her belly. She smiled at Nepeta.

"If I had a tail, it'd be wagging." she said quietly, still embarrassed. Nepeta grinned.

"You'd make a cute puppy. And you're so fun to pet!" she patted Jade's belly. Jade realized that her shirt had ridden up, exposing most of her bouncing tummy, but she didn't feel that embarrassed anymore. She was just getting petted, that was all! Oh, how she had longed for such contact...Jade let herself stay in a blissful state for a few minutes. She didn't want Nepeta to get tired, though.

"Thanks, Nepeta. I think I'm good now..."

"Heehee, you sure?" Nepeta asked playfully, helping Jade up. Jade grinned.

"Yeah. You were good at that!"

"Heh, I gave ponce belly rubs all the time! He wasn't so good at them though." she said with a smile. They shared a laugh. As they calmed down, a question arose to Jade's lips.

"How do you do it, though? Don't you get embarrassed?"

"No." Nepeta said, giving an emphatic shake of her head. "Your friends will still like you! As long as you be yourself, it's no purroblem!"

"Really?"

"Sure." Nepeta said with a nod. "Come on, unleash your inner puppy!"

Jade blushed, paused, and stayed still for a moment in thought. Then, too quickly for Nepeta to reach, she ducked in and licked at Nepeta's nose. She was back up in a flash. Nepeta was briefly shocked, but began to giggle. She leaned in, and her arms began to go around Jade.

"C'mere, puppy..."
1141211122.title: Cats and Dogs, and Belly Rubs

choices: They get interrupted - by Jade's rumbling tummy
11412111221.content:
Nepeta leaned in, and Jade froze, unsure what was coming next, unsure what to do. To her surprise, Nepeta's face brushed past hers. She had only a moment to wonder what the girl was up to before she felt something warm and wet on her ear. Nepeta gave it a careful nibble, and Jade gasped, her arms instinctively flinching up around Nepeta, pausing before they touched her but only just. Nepeta bit down harder and introduced her tongue, and Jade shivered and gasped again. She now purposefully wrapped her arms around Nepeta, dragging the would-be kitten closer to her. Jade began to pant as Nepeta worked down to her earlobe and back up, her warm breath going in and out of Jade's ear, her tongue gliding along.

"What's the matter, puppy?" Nepeta teased into Jade's ear. "Getting hot?"

Jade just whimpered, pressing against Nepeta's back with her fingertips, pleading for more. Nepeta got back to work, but this time as she nibbled on Jade's earlobe she went lower. Suddenly Nepeta's teeth were brushing against her neck as her moist lips pressed against her. She lapped the salty sweat from Jade's skin, then kissed it again, threatening to bite into Jade but not quite doing so. It was such an exciting pleasure, nearly pain but not quite so. Nepeta drew back to look at Jade face to face, seeing Jade's confused, pleading expression.

"What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?" Nepeta asked, sticking out her own tongue at Jade.

"N-no....but I've got yours.." Jade replied

"Wha-" Nepeta didn't have time to finish as Jade pounced on her. She landed on her back on the bed-furs, Jade square on top of her. It was a lip-first tackle, Jade pressing her pale pink lips up against Nepeta's gray ones. Nepeta's cleft lip was like an open door for Jade's tongue, which invited itself inside, hunting around Nepeta's teeth until it found the troll girl's own tongue. Nepeta murred into Jade's mouth as their tongues met and introduced themselves to one another. Jade could feel Nepeta's purr throughout her body. It resonated in her new adipose, creating a wave of excitement that seemed to center in near her crotch. Jade was heavy enough and Nepeta small enough in stature that Jade was pinning her down, and apparently they were both enjoying it. The kiss finally came to an end, and Jade got on her hands and knees to give Nepeta some space. The troll girl grinned up at her, her lips covered in a mix of their saliva.

"I...I don't really know what I'm doing." Jade admitted. This rush of feelings was so new to her! She was just working up the courage to admit to herself there were people she like liked and here she was, on top of another girl, ready to do whatever her body was driving her to do.

"Neither do I..." Nepeta said. "Just be yourself, remember?"

"...Yeah." Jade said with a grin. She pushed up her glasses and went back down on top of Nepeta.
11412111221.title: Animal instinct?

choices: Jade waits for Nepeta to come back
114121112212.content:
Jade was nibbling hard on Nepeta's bottom lip when a rumble rocked her body. She blinked and let go of Nepeta's mouth to giggle.

"Heh, was that you purring?" she asked. Nepeta laughed.

"No silly, guess again." she said, patting the side of Jade's squidgy stomach with one hand. Just as she did so, Jade felt the rumble again, and this time realised it was coming from her own gut. She got up into a sitting position and looked down at herself. Nepeta got up as well, and laid a hand over Jade's belly, giving it a circular rub.

"Guess you're still hungry?" she asked, nibbling on Jade's ear. Jade could barely think straight with Nepeta's warm breath on her, but murmured a yes.

"All this had to come somewhere..." she figured after a moment. Nepeta nodded.

"You...hee hee...want some more?" she asked, nodding to the forgotten plates of food. Jade blushed. She could tell that Nepeta liked her new softness...honestly, she was beginning to enjoy it too....but she wasn't sure what she'd tell the others if she got much bigger. She wasn't sure what she was going to tell them now anyways!

"Maybe I ought to have some regular food...uh, I mean human food...for now. In case there's any side effects."

"Murr...okay..." Nepeta said, only sounding a little disappointed. "Hey! I could alchemize some if you want."

"You'd do that?" Jade asked. Nepeta nodded, so Jade got out her pictionary captchaloguer. Deciding that it really made no sense for her to worry about her figure, she went for broke and drew herself an ice cream sundae. Sure enough, the device picked up on it and gave her the ghost image, the code for which she passed to Nepeta.

"Thank you!" Jade said as Nepeta dashed off. She grinned to herself, and began to look around Nepeta's room. The girl was cute, but so very wild. It was kinda exciting. Jade couldn't really make sense of the symbols on the wall, and wasn't sure what else to look at - she didn't want to pry after all. Her eyes rested on the food again. It was surprisingly tempting...she was already in deep, after all, and if they were going to have to figure out a way to reverse it, she might as well enjoy it while it lasted. That was the odd thing, how enjoyable it was, but Jade had stopped questioning her own tastes about the time she was swapping spit with an alien furry. But she knew it could be dangerous...and there was a difference between her chubbiness and whatever would happen if she kept eating. Maybe it'd be safer to wait....
114121112212.title: Food & Temptation

choices: Sure enough, Nepeta begins to bloat
1141211122121.content:
"No, I really shouldn't..." Jade said, squirming where she sat. Wow, even her butt was softer! Jade tried to keep her mind off of the food by turning her attention to the pile of furs arranged into a bed. Such majestic creatures these must have once belonged to...how had little Nepeta ever taken them down? Actually, it wasn't that hard to imagine. Jade had felt Nepeta's body, a little, when she had lain on top of her. Hidden behind that baggy clothing and ratty coat were cords of tightly wound muscle, solid as rock. Jade could only imagine what Nepeta would look like naked...she could, however, imagine what Nepeta looked like naked, and began to get a dreamy look on her face as her glasses fogged up...

"Got it!" Nepeta burst into the room excitedly. She pulled out a captcha card (no, don't ask how) and before Jade was suddenly a bowl of ice cream big enough to drown in, one that took both Nepeta's arms to carry. Showcasing just the kind of strength Jade had guessed at, Nepeta easily toted it over to the bed.

"I may have scaled it up, to be on the safe side. It smells so sweet!" she remarked. Jade nodded, drooling a little over the ice cream. Oh sure, she could never eat this much - but she had a growing desire to indulge herself, and this sure fit the bill! Then an idea hit her.

"Nepeta, you didn't try any, did you?" she asked worriedly. Nepeta shook her head.

"No...I was wondering though..."

"What if it does the same thing?" Jade asked.

"What if it does?" Nepeta asked, sounding both playful and naughty. She lifted up her shirt, surprising Jade a little with abs like chiselled stone.

"Wouldn't it make for better tummy rubs?" she asked, looking for Jade's approval.

"But- you're so fit!"

Nepeta put down her shirt, looking grumpy (that is, adorable). "So? You'd be too if you had to hunt all day."

"You've got to be kitten me..." Jade said, again not noticing her pun. Nepeta giggled gleefully. Jade began to imagine Nepeta on her lap, tummy in the air, purring under her touch...she knew how good it had felt for her...

"Why don't you try a bite?" she said.

"Yay!" Nepeta was giddy. She sat down - on Jade's lap. Her thigh pressed against Jade's belly. Jade blushed and watched Nepeta lean in to lick the mound of ice cream. Jade decided to ask about utensils later.

"Wow! this is a-meow-zing!" Nepeta said, her face quickly sticky with ice cream. Jade giggled, leaned over, and licked it from Nepeta's cheek.

"Let's just hope we're right about this..." she said, not stopping Nepeta as she went back in for more.
1141211122121.title: Why should Jade have all the fun?

11412111221211.content:
Jade put aside her fears, deciding to go after the ice cream before Nepeta ate all of it herself! It was a little weird, not being able to use a spoon or anything, but at the same time it was fun. She was putting aside all those rules of a civilisation that didn't even exist any more, and was acting more naturally, even if the food she ate was anything but. She soon was eating as quickly as Nepeta, without pause, finding that with her increased size came a bigger appetite. Jade began to think that maybe she could get used to this, her new shape. info.brief_description: Kids and fun! And horrifying mental images!
info.description:
This interactive may take place during or between any acts of the Homestuck story.

It's for anything expansion related with any of the Homestuck characters.

Weight gain, pregnancy, muscle, giant(ess), vore, inflation, whatever.

Want to throw in something else in there like death or scat? Sure, why not?

Let's not try to fool ourselves, people. This is fap material. Expect anything and everything with expansion.

When starting an entirely new story, you may begin writing in the MSPA style if you so desire. Yes, bolded words and all.

When responding to a chapter, please use whatever format the previous chapter used.


Many thanks to the following for contributing in some form
Unabashed
flinkDrinks

Many negative feelings to the following for being an ass
Cupcake Man

More coming soon, I swear.
